title: Design for a Dining Room for the Exhibition: Contemporary American Industrial Art, at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
medium:
Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, ruled border in graphite.
Support: white wove construction paper
description: A view into dining room shows a rectangular dining table with underlit glass rectangle in middle of metal base. Six metal, upholstered chairs surround table. Under table is an area rug with geometric motif. On back wall to the right, a streamlined sideboard with underlit glass panel. Left wall is glass block from which are suspended two glass shelves. A drawn curtain can be seen at left of glass block wall.
name: Drawing
